channel.title: MPC on Yueqian's Page
channel.description: Recent content in MPC on Yueqian's Page

item.title: OmniHex
item.description: LINKS & DOWNLOADS Presentation of Early Work (English) Research Proposal (Chinese) Midterm Summary (Chinese) Closing Presentation (Chinese) Thesis (Chinese) VIDEO DEMO Dev Milestones Upgrade to ROS2: 100% PID and Newton-Euler Dynamics in SITL: 100% Real hardware drivers and maiden flight: 100% Controller architecture and design: 100% Formulate MPC solver using acados: 100% Test MPC solver in Python: 100% L1-MPC python simulation: 100% ROS L1-MPC node: 100% Track trajectories and collect data: 100% Thesis writing: 100% Far from perfect, but done for now (May29, 2022)
